root.info: Randomization runs preferences for the ReReMi algorithm.

parameter.name: traits_data
parameter.label: Traits data filename
parameter.legend: Complete filename for the traits data.

parameter.name: data_t
parameter.label: Traits data basename
parameter.legend: Basename of the file containing the traits data.

parameter.name: ext_t
parameter.label: Traits data extension
parameter.legend: Extension of the file containing the traits data.

parameter.name: count_vname
parameter.label: Name count variable
parameter.legend: Name for the variable that stores occurrence counts.

parameter.name: select_red
parameter.label: Selection redescription
parameter.legend: Redescription used to select data rows.

parameter.name: rnd_meth
parameter.label: Randomization meth.
parameter.legend: Randomization method used to generate data.

parameter.name: rnd_series_size
parameter.label: Randomization serie size
parameter.legend: Number of runs per randomization series.

parameter.name: rnd_seed
parameter.label: Randomization seed
parameter.legend: Seed for the random number generator.
